Developpement Guide Line¶

Created jeudi 10 décembre 2015

Documentations¶

Documentations are mainly generated using sphinx and restructured text. All files are in the docs folders. To regenerate the docs in the docs/_build folder use:
cd docs
make html

Python style guide references¶

http://pythonhosted.org/an_example_pypi_project/sphinx.html#full-code-example
http://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pyguide.html
